# isPlaying

**Instance Property**

A Boolean that indicates whether the sound is playing its audio data.

## Declaration

```swift
var isPlaying: Bool { get }
```

## Discussion

The value of this property is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] when the receiver is playing its audio data.

## Playing Sounds

- **beep()**: Plays the system beep.
- **pause()**: Pauses audio playback.
- **play()**: Initiates audio playback.
- **resume()**: Resumes audio playback.
- **stop()**: Concludes audio playback.
title: isPlaying
